Subject: JUnitPerf 1.3 Released
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=us-ascii; format=flowed
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
From: Mike Clark <mike@...>

JUnitPerf 1.3 is now available with the following important 
multi-threading bug fix:

Version: 1.3
Date: 05.11.01
Description: Bug fix release.
Changes:
The LoadTest now employs a ThreadBarrier to allow threads spawned by
ThreadedTest instances to properly signal their completion.  Threads
spawned by test case methods, either directly or indirectly, without a
specified thread group are added to the ThreadedTestGroup by default.
This was causing the active count of the thread group to never fall to
0, thereby causing the load test to hang indefinitely.  These types of
rogue threads are no longer participants in the test completion criteria.

JUnitPerf 1.3 can be downloaded from

           http://www.clarkware.com/software/junitperf1.3.zip

Thanks to everyone who has contributed to this release of JUnitPerf.
Any feedback you may have is most welcome!

Thanks!

Mike

-- 
Mike Clark
Clarkware Consulting, Inc.

subject: JUnitPerf 1.3 Released
